unnormalised: ## Mhojem Desi Kutumbache Natak: Ghorfutti Edition (LOL)
normalised: ## My Desi Family Drama: Divorce Edition (L-O-L)

unnormalised: Okay ixttanno, pett'tti bandun gheiat, kiteak auntiji eka vixoyacher chai ottta, zo konnakuch avoddonam, punn dor eklo thoddo zata: kutumb niyam, khas korun ghorfutti. Atam, tumi maka saree-nt runvta astana chitr kaddchea adim, shant ravat. Hem *mhaka* natak nhoi. Punn mhaka Bollywood filmak podd marat oxem puro korttil chitrapat hanvem dekhlam. Ani mhojer visvas theva, te ghorfutttiche vakil kainch korn johar porim asat – nataki, stylish, ani sodanch bhanddnnak uttejit kartat.
normalised: Okay lokanho, togar bandun bosa, kiteak mhonnllear Auntiji chai volloun ek vixeacher uloupak asa zo konnakuch avoddona, punn soglleamni thoddo bhow kel'lo asta: family law, khas korun divorce. Atam, tumi mhaka mhoje saree-nt ruddon astana pollouche adim, thondd zai. Hem *mhojem* drama nhoi. Punn hanvem Bollywood filmak takkar divpache itlem court-antlem natak pollelam. Ani mhojeacher visvas dovrat, te divorce lawyer legal sonvsarantle Karan Johar sarkhe astat - dramatic, stylish, ani sadam pot'tti gholloupache.

unnormalised: Poile mhuxel: bhayanak kalam 498A. Mhanjech, baylecho bodlo. Bhartantle dor ek ghov hea IPC chea kalmak bhieuta. Tem sodarne vindaloo poros odik mosaleant bhorlam, ani pramanikponnan sangchem zalear, kednam tem yogya asa. Her vellar, sangchea poros bore mhuz maa tichea bahuchea mathear Zee TV zaitim polloun vichar ghaltat. Mhozo shezari suresh, to tachi biwi taka dhamki dita tea uprant to ghamorta. Tannem tika eka hireachi nakhi (Rs. 50,000 ka!) ani banarasantle tem aytelem saree viktem ghetlem. Punn, dristtichea proxnnank lagun, tika Switzerlandak suttien vochonk zai. #Bharatiyabaylechimdhyeaam.
normalised: Poilem mahatvachem: bhayanak Section charxim ani nov'vod ani atth A. A-k-a, bailacho revenge. Bharotantlo dor husband I-P-C chea hea sectionak bhita. To sadharonn vindaloo poros chodd masaleant bhoron dakholl kortat ani, promannikponnan, kednaim tem niyay'y asta. Her vellar, tor chala mhonnchea konnachi-i maa Z-T-V zaitich polleun aplea bahuchea dokean vichar bhorta. Mhozo paadoshi Suresh, to apnne biwi hi dakholl korteli mhunn sangllya uprant dhumrelli uttaita. Tannem tika diamond nakshtranchi ring (rupee ponchas hazar ka!) dili ani Banarasantli import keli saree vikat ghetli. Punn, dista ki tika Switzerlandant vacation zai asa. hash Indian Wife Goals.

unnormalised: Magir tumka bharn posonna varta sangop meltta. O, natak! Tte shark tankache eka sampnache porim asa, punn odik dukhanim ani unne mulankanam. Hanvem eka ghovaiek tark korina dekhlea, taka zaitench daddunkanam kiteak tachi bayle tanchi sogli duddu "nirarthak vostunk" kharch korta, tichea maimche vaidyaki bill porim. Saib, gambhirponnan? Toxench, ajkalkit kiteak yogya rakhmo asa? Aikolam konnak tori tajea ghovachea pagarache 20% jivitbhar mell'lle. Jivit!
normalised: Uprant alimony negotiations astai. Oh, drama! Tem Shark Tank-achem kadinch sonpona tashem asta, punn zaitich ruddanim ani unnea valuation-an. Hanvem ekda eka husbandak mhonnun ghetanam pollelem ki tannem itlem kiteak bhortoch naxil'le kiteak tika tichea auyche medical billanchea "nirikarthak vostuncher" soglle poixe khorch korche poddle. Sir, seriously? Ani, aizkal reasonable amount kitei asta? Aikollam ki konnak tori apnnachea husbandachea pokhlecho vis percent jibher lagun dislem. Life!

unnormalised: Bhurgenche dakhlek lagun zhuz? Kalliz fulunk. Kalpna kara don lok, zannim ekmekakoddlean atam hat dukanunk xakxonam, atam chottech rohanacher dhonta ani nakham dhotat. Nibai asa solomon porim, konnak bhurgem melltta tem sodun kaddunk protnn korta, taka don vattak daddche vostu minus. Punn, hanvem kaim kosit ailea tea uprant, hanvem taka uloyonam zalear to tem suchounk asta. Rohanachem cricket coaching (Rs. 15,000 protim'mhinho) ani iskolachim bhartam bhanganak asat, lok! Hem koi mazak nhoi.
normalised: Bhurggeachem custody bhitor gheunk zata? Kallzak dukheta. Don monxam kal apnnachye hath eka mekacher soddun divpaak tayar naxil'lim astaalim, atam lhan Rohanacher zhogdtaat. Judge mhollear Solomon sarko, konnak bhurgo mellttolo mhunn sodta, minus him todun don bhag kortalo kanto. Punn, hea kazaranche aiklea uprant taka kosleni-i dukh dischinchi nam. Rohanachea cricket coachingachem (rupee pandra hazar mahinyak) ani school fee-chea khatir lok zhogddtaat! Hem joke nhoi.

unnormalised: Ani *khandan* (vaddelem kutumb) visronakanakat. Dor eklea kodden abhiprai asa, konui tem vanttun gheun shremevont zannar nann. "Beta, tumi vostu sarkheo korunk protnn korunk zai," te sangtat, zagech tumchea lognanchim masle dor Sharmaji ani Vermaji ichea colonyent vanttun ghetat. Bhartant eka ghorfutti hi ajun ek “log kya kahenge?” poristithi asa, 2024 otum! Tem dor eklo tumcher fokot hasunk ani tolunk xakhta, tumcho jivansathi tumchem dattochimbur tonkhent xudh korunk vaporta zalear. Nam, mhojher nodrent na.
normalised: Ani *khandan* (vaddovpache famil) visrunchonakat. Dor eka monxak aplea vishayachi mahiti asta, konnakuch ulovocho nam. "Beta, tumi vostu bharto paullacho prayatn korcho," te mhontat, tanchea gharcha vishayacher kolonyentlea dor ek Sharmaji ani Vermaji-kaal uloitat. Bharotant divorce mhollear "log kya kahenge?" sarki situation asta, don hazar ani teddvantle charant-i. Tumchea partneran tumche brush toiletak lavlear tumche dolle bandun ravouche khatir koslench karan nam. No, mhoje watchacher tem zalear chollchonam.

unnormalised: Pranjallponnan sangunk zalear, soglli proccriya sarkari office sarkhi uth'ttea somera von dhum'me asa. Tumchea khorem nibaycher ulounchea poros tumhi odik vell korttil waitinkuch meron voitat. Mrs. Iyer vs. Mr. Iyer hacho kas 2018 san choltasa! Tumchem kutumb poros tumhi korttil staff zait zanna zatat! Kai tacho muddo asta.
normalised: Promannikponnan, hi process eka government office-antlea Monday sokallchea sokallchem keliar zaitich slow zaleli dista. Tumkam courtache waiting room-ant zaito vell doddcho poddta, zaito vell judge-anchea sovem ulovon. Missus Iyer versus Mister Iyer-anchi case don hazar ani atthavea varseak chalu zalea! Courtache staff tumchea gharchya lokam poros chodd vollkhiche zataat! Kiteak mhonnllear tea chivddichi kheriz mhaka mahit asa.

unnormalised: Tech porim, bhartant kutumb niyam ek junglee sawar asa. Bhavnanchi eka rollercoaster, kagotpatram, ani auntiean udik zal'le sulochanim. Tumhi eka ghorfutttiacher vichar kortat zalear, eka bore vakila gheiat (ani kai therapist). Ani soglleak pavitr kel'leak lagun, viva-adhim-nirnnoi! Hem ek vivahache pagonache virudh veema-niti porim asa. Tumhi mhaka uprant mandtet. Atam, tumhi maka maf korunk zai, hanvem mhojea shezareachem aavaz aikonam. Live-action kutumb niyam natakachea vellak! *popcorn gheta*
normalised: Tor, yeah, Bharotant family law ek wild ride sarkhi asa. Ek rollercoaster sarkhi-i feelings, paperwork, ani aunties-an maginasleli selam. Tumkam divorce gheuncho asa mhonn chintlear, ek boro lawyer (ani therapist)-ak mellat. Ani mogan sodam pre-nup kadat! Tem lagna sombondhat zannam gheunk rakhen sarke upegi poddta. Tumi mhaka uprant thanks mhontali. Atam, tumi mhaka bhogun ghatlyar, aikata ki mhozo paadoshi bob martaa mhunn. Time for some live-action family law drama! *grabs popcorn*
